import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# Family size
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Age bins
train_df['AgeBin'] = pd.cut(train_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])
test_df['AgeBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

# Fare bins
train_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(train_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])
test_df['FareBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Fare'], bins=[0, 10, 20, 40, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3])

# Title extraction
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr', 'Rev': 'Rev', 'Col': 'Col', 'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs', 'Don': 'Rare', 'Sir': 'Rare',
        'Lady': 'Rare', 'Capt': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Other')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Encode titles
title_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title'] = title_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title'] = title_encoder.transform(test_df['Title'])

# Fill missing values
train_df['Age'] = train_df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median())
train_df['Fare'] = train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median())
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].fillna(train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Encode categorical features
train_df['Sex'] = train_df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
test_df['Sex'] = test_df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})

# Drop unnecessary columns
train_df = train_df.drop(['Name', '

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

import pandas as pd

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# Family size
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# Age bins

test_df['AgeBin'] = pd.cut(test_df['Age'], bins=[0, 12, 18, 35, 60, 100], labels=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4])

    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()

        'Dr': 'Dr', 'Rev': 'Rev', 'Col': 'Col', 'Major': 'Major',

        'Lady': 'Rare', 'Capt': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare'

test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# Fill missing values
train_df['Age'] = train_df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median())
train_df['Fare'] = train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median())
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].fillna(train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Encode categorical features
train_df['Sex'] = train_df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
test_df['Sex'] = test_df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})

# Drop unnecessary columns
train_df = train_df.drop(['Name', 'Cabin'], axis=1)
test_df = test_df.drop(['Name', 'Cabin'], axis=1)

# Prepare final features

y = train_df['Survived']
